duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead execution of preclinical programs for skin reconstruction and regeneration
Design and execute pre-clinical studies including benchtop and animal studies
Process and analyze datasets, interpret results, and support FDA submissions
Engage with cross-functional team members and establish relationships with external partners
Implement new technologies and protocols to improve laboratory capabilities and efficiency
Stay updated with current scientific trends, company data, and competitive products

education_certification.credential: Advanced degree in scientific discipline with 3+ years of experience, skin biology desired
